# Stick (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a bit of dried glue)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Nonmagical, unattended object weighing up to 5 lb.

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (object)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 206

*Lacking someone to hold the item where you need it, you mutter and wave your hand in a simple gesture before sticking the item in place.*

*Stick* affixes one object weighing up to 5 pounds to another object. The two items can be separated with even a small amount of force, such as a wind stronger than 10 mph, a *[[Mage Hand (Spell)|mage hand]]* or *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]* spell, or a move action by any corporeal creature (which provokes attacks of opportunity).
